  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3201</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mnemonics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mnemotechnik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mnémonique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mnemônica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mnemonics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μνημονικό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mnemónicas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A collection of great Tips from teachers discussion groups in using Mnemonics in the learning of English Vocabulary</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">educational aids</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung große Spitzen von den 
Lehrerdiskussion Gruppen, wenn Mnemotechnik im Lernen des englischen 
Wortschatzes verwendet wird</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection de grandes extrémités des groupes
de discussion de professeurs en utilisant la mnémonique dans l'étude
du vocabulaire anglais</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção de pontas grandes dos grupos de 
discussão dos professores em usar mnemônica na aprendizagem do 
vocabulário inglês</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di punte grandi dai gruppi di 
discussione degli insegnanti nel usando i mnemonics nell'imparare del 
vocabolario inglese</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των μεγάλων ακρών από τις ομάδες 
συζήτησης δασκάλων σε χρησιμοποίηση του μνημονικού στην εκμάθηση 
του αγγλικού λεξιλογίου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de grandes extremidades de grupos 
de discusión de los profesores al usar mnemónicas en aprender del 
vocabulario inglés</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lernenstrategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pädagogische Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">aides éducatives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estratégias de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dae (dispositivo automático de entrada) educacionais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strategie di apprendimento</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
